verses.roman:
tāte rakṣā karite yadi haya sabāra mane
sabe meli' jānāha jagannāthera caraṇe

synonyms: tāte—therefore; rakṣā karite—to save; yadi—if; haya—is; sabāra—of all; mane—in the mind; sabe meli'-all together; jānāha—pray; jagannāthera caraṇe—at the lotus feet of Lord Jagannātha.
translation: "Therefore if you want to save him, you should all pray together at the lotus feet of Jagannātha.
